communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: As a trauma surgeon, I've seen the impact of harmful communities firsthand. My journey out of one such group has been tough but rewarding. Now, I'm here to help others navigate their recovery, sharing resources and celebrating every step forward. My wife, a college professor, and our little girl keep me grounded, while memories of my mother, a concert pianist, inspire me to keep pushing forward.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0029_d98b71. I share my recovery journey from harmful communities and support others doing the same. Let's take those steps together towards a healthier life.
